name: shakesearch
description: Welcome to the Pulley Shakesearch Take-home Challenge! In this repository, you'll find a simple web app that allows a user to search for a text string in the complete works of Shakespeare.

scripts.build: tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.20.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz && export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin && cd client && npm install && npm run build
